original: intros E E' H. unfold Union in H. apply CIN_IN in H. apply Union_IN in H. destruct H as [E1 [H1 H2]]. exists E1. apply pair_t. - apply H1. - apply CIN_sound_right with (E' := E'). * apply EQC_refl. * apply CIN_IN in H2. apply IN_EXType in H2 as [x Hx]. apply CIN_EXType in H2. apply depprod_existence in H2. destruct H2 as [y Hy]. apply EQ_EXType in Hy. clever_unfold. apply Hy.
